title: PSA: Blue Buff grants 15% bonus to Ability Power as of Patch 6.9
body:
Im super salty about how many people still dont know this.

This is not directed at junglers, just anyone who simply was unaware.

So please, consider this when debating who should get the blue buff late game.

E.g. pre 6.9 It gave 36 ap late game, and now can easily grant well over 100 ap depending on current ap.

P.s. Its things like this that are the reason ap items generally have less ap now.

replies.body: Red Buff heals your health.
when you smite?
No, out of combat Red Buff heals much like a Warmogs.
only in late-game tho

Untrue. A Trundle on the enemy team was healing 21 health per second while he had red buff. It was ridiculous. We couldn't kill him because he'd just run away and heal all his health up.  He was only level 7. T__T so ridic.

It's really worth giving the blue to your AP midlaner now, even if they are manaless like kat or akali +15% AP is a big deal especially late game.

Those 15% more AP stack up great with infernal dragons, I've had one game as Fizz where I got almost 1100 AP because of 3 infernals (+24%AP/AD and blue +15%) at that point the blue was giving like 120 AP or something which is alot.

Consider giving away your blue buff guys or get it for yourself if you're an AP carry jungler and have nobody worthy to give it to

As a player who mained and still plays a lot of akali: pretty much everyone except energy champion mains doesn't realize how amazing blue buff is on energy champs, especially kennen and akali, both of whom stack AP and appreciate the bonus 6 energy per second which will basically make them resourceless in most fights.

Seriously, I'd go so far as to say blue buff is better on akali than it is on your standard mana using midlaner, and MUCH better on akali than some jungler.

Just for the record, Dragon does NOT increase the AP from blue buff 

It works like this 

Base AP + Base AP x Rabadons bonus + Base AP x Dragon bonus + Base ap x Blue buff bonus.

Its still a fuckton of AP, they just stack additively rather than multiplicatively 

So in the end, if you have 3 internals (no elder), rabadons and blue you currently have 74% bonus AP, instead of the "myth" of them being multiplicative which would be ~92% bonus AP 

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/6P-bczPN1JE/maxresdefault.jpg

Freedom to invade the enemy jungle are your mid laner can colapse first, and freedom from being invaded (unless you are really far behind) because again, if the enemy jungler tries something, its gona be a 1v2.

And ofc, it also requires your mid laner to not be totally destroyed by the enemy mid laner.

side note: mid Diana main here, and I love blue buffs <3
